heading.title: The Umarel Philosophy
heading.subheadline: Construction is chaos. Disputes are bandwidth killers. We provide the Source of Truth that turns "he said, she said" into verified collaboration.

bandwidth.title: Collaboration Bandwidth
bandwidth.description: Every minute spent arguing is a minute not building. We use AI and expert oversight to clear the noise so you can focus on the craft.

judge.title: The Pragmatic Judge
judge.description: Perfect justice is slow. We optimize for fair flow. Our goal is to keep the project moving while protecting the integrity of the deal.

growth.title: Sustainable Growth
growth.description: A marketplace built on truth grows organically. Good providers get the "Verified Truthful" badge; bad actors get filtered out by the swarm.

Ai miei tempi qui era tutta campagna. (In my times this was all countryside.)
Ma chi ha fatto questo lavoro? (Who did this job?)
Manca il tocco finale. (Missing the final touch.)
Hands behind your back, eyes on the details.
A bad foundation ruins the whole house.
Measure twice, cut once... then measure again because you probably did it wrong.

home.heroSubtitle: Post your project. Our community of wise experts will break it down into manageable slices. You only pay for what gets done.
home.howItWorksSubtitle: We bring the wisdom of the construction site to your daily tasks.
home.step1Desc: Describe what you need done. "Fix my kitchen" or "Build a website". No need for technical details yet.
home.step2Desc: Our community of wise Umarels breaks your request into small, precise "Execution Cards".
home.step3Desc: Providers quote on individual cards. You accept and pay only when each card is completed.

concept.title: What is an Umarel?
concept.subtitle: Wisdom in Action
concept.description: Inspired by the Italian tradition of the observant elder, an **Umarel** is a guardian of quality. They don't just watch; they ensure truth.
concept.digital: We've evolved this role. On our platform, **Umarels are community experts** who verify specialized workâ€”from home renovations to wellness experiencesâ€”ensuring you get exactly what was promised.

clients.title: For Seekers
clients.description: Whether you need a renovation or a soul-retrieval journey, book with confidence knowing every detail is verified.

providers.title: For Creators
providers.description: Focus on your craft. We handle the payments, the scope, and the trust.

umarels.title: For Umarels
umarels.description: Earn from your expertise. Review projects, offer insights, and share in the 3% Community Dividend.

cta.title: Join the Transparent Economy
cta.subtitle: Fair pricing Â· Community rewards Â· 100% Verified Truth
cta.joinText: Be part of a marketplace owned by its reputation.

italianQuotes.q1: Truth is the foundation of all value.
italianQuotes.q2: Measure twice, cut once, live fully.
italianQuotes.q3: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
italianQuotes.q4: The community sees what the individual misses.
italianQuotes.q5: Fairness is the only sustainable business model.

trustHero.title: Experts you can trust. Projects you can verify.
trustHero.subtitle: From complex renovations to heart-opening tours. We use AI and community wisdom to ensure fair prices and perfect execution.
trustHero.ticker: Transparency is our currency... Community rewards for helpful members... Verified reviews only...

demoCard.insightText: Fair price confirmed. Provider has 15 successful verified trips. Weather contingency is included.

client.title: The Seeker
client.description: You have a needâ€”a repair to be made or an experience to be lived. Define it here, and let the community guide you.

builder.title: The Creator
builder.description: Artisans, guides, and experts. You deliver value. We ensure you get paid fair rates for your verified skills.

umarel.title: The Umarel
umarel.description: The wise observer. You review scopes, settle disputes, and earn a share of the platform's success.

safetyTips.title: Community Values
tips: We share the value we create.
Leave it better than you found it.
